#summary Upgrading Scalr from Version 1.0 RC2 to 1.0 RC3

= Update source code =

  * if you checked out the source via SVN, go to application directory and do 
{{{ 
svn up 
}}}

  * If you installed from the archive, simply download the RC3 archive and replace all files with new ones (except etc folder) 

= Update database = 
  * Import sql/upgrade_1.0RC2-1.0RC3.sql sql/upgrade_1.0RC2-1.0RC3.sql into your database.
  * execute bin/upgrade_from_RC2_to_RC3.php in shell.

{{{
 php ./bin/upgrade_from_RC2_to_RC3.php
}}}
